m_szDocSumamry: Taking the Hyundai Tucson FCEV out for a spin Hydrogen-fuelled, zero-emissions vehicle now on the streets of Surrey, B.C. Share on Facebook The Hyundai Tucson FCEV looks like a regular Tucson ... until you open it up. By: Mike Goetz For Metro Published on Last week I drove an example of the first fuel-cell vehicle to go on sale in Canada. The first jolt was that the Hyundai Tucson FCEV looks alarmingly like any other 2013 to 2015 Tucson.
